Suukie arives in the base and throws himself into the CR chamber...he was
laughing an annoying laugh for some unknown reason......Plintissa heard as
she was going out the door...that bot was ANNOYING is what he was!...she
thought........ Plintissa walked outside of the base and sat next to the
flowers............
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, April 27, 2000 12:17 AM
Subject: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Zardus/Striker/Prowl::
>
> Zardus snarls. "Hold you fire. For now..." He says to the others around
him.
>
> FZ, DevilDuer, and DeathStorm stop firing and he walks over to Wolfgang,
> shielding his eyes from the light of the explosion of Nemesis' missile.
>
> "We are firing at you," He says through closed teeth, "Because you
attempted
> to take controll, and I don't apreciate that."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Striker nods.
>
> "Maybe. See ya around, Ramhorn," He says and walks off down a corridor.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Prowl lands back inside the Ark. He couldn't find Suukie, so he returned
to
> base. He walks off in the direction of the CR chambers to check on Iron
> Raptor.
>
